about_product.name: High Power Control Tuya WiFi AC or Water Heater Smart Switch
about_product.description: High Power Control Tuya WiFi AC or Water Heater Smart Switch is a powerful, Wi-Fi-enabled switch designed for heavy-duty appliances like air conditioners and water heaters. It supports remote control, scheduling, timers, and voice control via Alexa and Google Assistant. With sleek design and manual/automated toggling, it fits modern homes perfectly. Ideal for smart lighting upgrades, it also pairs well with dimmers for energy-efficient brightness control. This smart switch enhances convenience, safety, and energy management in any smart home setup.

seller_information.about_store: Smarthome Ghana delivers innovative smart home solutions that enhance comfort, security, and convenience. From smart locks and video doorbells to automated lighting and curtains, our systems integrate with Google Assistant, Apple HomeKit, and Amazon Alexa for seamless control via voice or mobile apps. With hundreds of projects and thousands of devices installed, we make modern living smarter, safer, and easier.

about_product.name: 4-Gang Tuya Control Wifi Smart Switch, No Neutral
about_product.description: Upgrade to modern convenience with the 4-Gang Tuya WiFi Smart Switch. It controls multiple lights from one sleek, touch-responsive panel—no neutral wire required. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant, it offers voice control, smart scheduling, and ambiance adjustment. Perfect for replacing double switches.

about_product.name: 1-Gang Tuya Control Wifi Smart Switch, No Neutral
about_product.description: The 1-Gang Tuya Control WiFi Smart Switch is a sleek, touch-sensitive smart light switch that works without a neutral wire — perfect for older homes. It supports up to 10A, connects via WiFi, and can be controlled remotely through the Tuya app or voice assistants like Alexa and Google Assistant. With easy installation, modern design, and full smart functionality, it’s an ideal upgrade for smart, stylish lighting control.

about_product.name: Canon EOS R10
about_product.description: The EOS R10 is perfect for content creators looking to take their creativity to the next level. Featuring a high-speed shooting 15 FPS mechanical shutter, a 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, and lightning fast autofocus, the EOS R10 camera brings some of the best features from the growing EOS R Series to a sleek, lightweight design.

name: High Power Tuya Smart Switch with Energy Monitoring
description: Smart high-power WiFi switch for ACs, water heaters and heavy appliances. Supports real-time energy monitoring, schedules and remote control via Tuya app, Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: 4-Gang Glass Panel Tuya Smart Switch
description: Elegant 4-gang touch glass panel switch that controls four lighting zones from a single plate. Works with Tuya app, scenes and timers for living rooms and offices.

name: 3-Gang Tuya Switch with Scene Control
description: Create custom lighting scenes with this 3-gang Tuya WiFi switch. Dim lights, automate bedtime scenes and control everything from your phone.

name: 2-Gang Smart Switch for Living Room
description: Control chandelier and wall lights separately with this 2-gang Tuya WiFi switch. No neutral required, ideal for existing Ghanaian homes.

name: Single Gang Tuya Smart Switch for Bedroom
description: Minimalist one-gang smart switch for bedside or hallway lighting. Supports remote control, schedules and voice commands through Tuya.
